channel.title: NetBeans Screencasts and Video Demos
channel.description: Screencasts that show you all the cool features of NetBeans, the free and open-source IDE for Java development and scripting.

item.title: Using JavaFX Composer in NetBeans IDE 6.9
item.description: The JavaFX Composer is a visual layout tool for building JavaFX GUI applications, similar to the Swing GUI Builder for Java SE applications.

item.title: NetBeans Platform 6.9
item.description: An overview of the NetBeans Platform, a Swing-based framework for developing desktop applications.
